snippet: Ms. Minarik began working on her series of Little Bear books after teaching grade school.
abstract: Else Holmelund Minarik, a writer for children whose Little Bear picture-book series has been a mainstay of childhood for more than half a century, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Minarik began working on her series of Little Bear books after teaching grade school.

headline.seo: Else Holmelund Minarik, Children’s Writer, Dies at 91
headline.main: Else Holmelund Minarik, Author of Little Bear Books, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Else Holmelund Minarik, 91, Author of Little Bear Books
